April 27 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:

  • AVEVA GROUP PLC - TRADING UPDATE

  • AVEVA - ON A STANDALONE ORGANIC CONSTANT CURRENCY BASIS, ACHIEVED DOUBLE DIGIT REVENUE GROWTH DURING SECOND HALF OF YEAR

  • AVEVA - THIS RESULTED IN FULL YEAR REVENUE BEING FLAT YEAR-ON-YEAR, ON SAME BASIS, REFLECTING DISRUPTION RELATED TO COVID-19 CRISIS DURING FIRST HALF

Source text for Eikon: (Full Story)

Further company coverage: AVV.L
